  • Reducing Email Noise

    If you are anything like me you probably check your email 100+ times a day. Over the last few months I have been trying to reduce the volume of messages received. Most of the emails were not providing real value and just a distraction/time drain. Below shows my progress with a snapshot from July 2012 vs July 2013.
